name: Forgotten Path Beta
description:
Forgotten Path is a maze game made with Game Maker: Studio. Forgotten path is little diffrent from other maze games as you cant see the whole map.

To enter fullscreen use Alt+Enter.

Forgotten Path is still in beta. New level are being created as we speak.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
  • Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics
  • 8MB storage

version: 0.0.0.6.
